com.ephesoft.gxt.home.client

Interface BatchListService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DCMARemoteService, com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchListServiceImpl

    @RemoteServiceRelativePath(value="batchListService")
public interface BatchListService
extends DCMARemoteService
    BatchListService is a service interface that provides data for displaying in a GWT AdvancedTable widget. Life-cycle: 1) getRowsCount() is called by the client to estimate the number of available records on the server. 2) getRows() is called by the client to display a particular page (a subset of the available data) 3) getIndividualRowCounts() is called by the client to get the count of similar types of records. 4) getNextBatchInstance() is called by the client to get the next record from the server. The implementing class can use database or other back-end as data source. The first table column is considered row identifier (primary key).
    Version:
    1.0.0
    $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 13-Apr-2015
